attributes.action: Honour Rowetta Satchell for her contibution to Musicand the Gay Community and her endless charity work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rowetta not only has been involved in the music scene for many years but has worked hard within the Gay community promoting Charity events and Gay pride events 
Rowetta is always ready to provide her services and talent to help raise much needed funds and awareness for many charities

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
